Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameAction.build

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BuildBehavior
    This is the interface for the build behavior.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtlasBuild
    ATLAS Your Worker may build a dome at any level including the ground.
    AtlasBuildTest
    ATLAS Your Worker may build a dome at any level including the ground.
    BuildContext
    This is the context for the build behavior.
    DemeterBuild
    DEMETER Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.
    HephaestusBuild
    HEPHAESTUS Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block",
    HestiaBuild
    HESTIA Your worker may build one additional time.
    LimusBuild
    LIMUS Opponents Workers can not build on spaces neighboring your workers, unless building a dome to create a Complete Tower");
    SimpleBuild
    A token can build in all 8 Cells around himself except the cell's that are a dome, the cell's where there is a player.
    SimplePerformBuildTest
    This just receive a Cell and call the incrementHeight method on that cell.
    SimpleValidBuildTest
    A token can build in all 8 Cells around himself except the cell's that are a dome, the cell's where there is a player.
    ZeusBuild
    ZEUS: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
    ZeusBuildTest
